title: App Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Instructional Design Scenarios for Complex Skill Learning in Vocational Training

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze core components of industrial robot control systems and explain their structural characteristics
Learners can systematize complex technical problem-solving procedures into three or more stages through virtual simulations utilizing digital twin technology
Learners can analyze skill proficiency gaps and develop improvement plans based on real-time feedback provided by automated formative assessment systems
Learners can translate robot control skills acquired through team-based project implementation into application-ready levels for actual industrial settings
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
